text:
whicle compiling a project I get the following error:
[javac] The system is out of resources.
    [javac] Consult the following stack trace for details.
    [javac] 
    [javac] java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
    [javac]     <<no stack trace available>>
creator: jaskaran.dhaliwal@lehman.com
tim@adjective.org
text:
Allocate more memory to your JVM.
See the resolution to 4384.
